articles.title: India's Gautam Adani: Asia's richest man weathering stock market panic - CNA
articles.description: Shares in the business empire of Asia's richest man Gautam Adani nosedived after a US investment firm claimed it had committed "brazen" corporate fraud.
articles.content:
MUMBAI: Indian industrialist Gautam Adani is Asia's richest man, with a business empire spanning coal, airports, cement and media.
He is now rocked by corporate fraud allegations and a stock market … [+3848 chars]

articles.description: Background Understanding the interactions between bat flies and host bats offer us fundamental insights into the coevolutionary and ecological processes in host-parasite relationships. Here, we investigated the identities, host specificity, and patterns of ho…

articles.title: 'You still look pregnant', 'She doesn't look like you': What not to say to a new (and vulnerable) mother - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Do we unconsciously judge or criticise new mothers and their babies? During a time of great stress and transition, some of our seemingly harmless comments may cut deeper than we think.
articles.content: Some months back, a friend of mine gave birth to a baby girl. Now, my friend is an attractive woman, but as she puts it herself, her baby did not conform to conventional standards of beauty. Her newb… [+1100 chars]
